00026       class db_config_set_1_0_0{
00027             
00038             var                           $Config = false;
00039             
00050             var                           $ConfigPath = false;
00051             
00062             var                           $CachedFS = false;
00063             
00078             function                __construct()
00079             {
00080                   try
00081                   {
00082                         $this->CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00083                   }
00084                   catch( Exception $e )
00085                   {
00086                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00087                   }
00088             }
00089             
00108             function                load_config( $ConfigPath )
00109             {
00110                   try
00111                   {
00112                         $this->Config = $this->CachedFS->file_get_contents( $ConfigPath );
00113                         
00114                         $this->Config = str_replace( "\r\n" , "\n" , $this->Config );
00115 
00116                         $this->Config = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $this->Config );
00117                         
00118                         $this->Config = explode( "\n" , $this->Config );
00119                         
00120                         $this->ConfigPath = $ConfigPath;
00121                   }
00122                   catch( Exception $e )
00123                   {
00124                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00125                   }
00126             }
00127             
00150             function                optimize_config_file( $i , $ConfigLine )
00151             {
00152                   try
00153                   {
00154                         if( $i != 0 )
00155                         {
00156                               $Content = $ConfigLine."\r\n";
00157                               
00158                               foreach( $this->Config as $j => $ConfigLine2 )
00159                               {
00160                                     if( $i != $j && $ConfigLine2 != '' )
00161                                     {
00162                                           $Content .= $ConfigLine2."\r\n";
00163                                     }
00164                               }
00165                               $this->Config = $this->CachedFS->file_put_contents( $this->ConfigPath , $Content );
00166                         }
00167                   }
00168                   catch( Exception $e )
00169                   {
00170                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00171                   }
00172             }
00173             
00204             function                process_config_line( $DBAdapter , $i , $ConfigLine )
00205             {
00206                   try
00207                   {
00208                         if( $ConfigLine != '' )
00209                         {
00210                               $DBAdapter->connect( $ConfigLine );
00211                               
00212                               $this->optimize_config_file( $i , $ConfigLine );
00213                               
00214                               return( $DBAdapter->get_connection() );
00215                         }
00216                   }
00217                   catch( Exception $e )
00218                   {
00219                         return( false );
00220                   }
00221             }
00222             
00241             function                connect( $DBAdapter )
00242             {
00243                   try
00244                   {
00245                         if( $this->Config == false )
00246                         {
00247                               throw( new Exception( 'Config was not loaded' ) );
00248                         }
00249                         
00250                         foreach( $this->Config as $i => $ConfigLine )
00251                         {
00252                               $Connection = $this->process_config_line( $DBAdapter , $i , $ConfigLine );
00253                               
00254                               if( $Connection !== false )
00255                               {
00256                                     return( $Connection );
00257                               }
00258                         }
00259                         
00260                         throw( new Exception( "Unable to connect to the database" ) );
00261                   }
00262                   catch( Exception $e )
00263                   {
00264                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00265                   }
00266             }
00267       }
